00020 #ifndef RDK2_TIME_TIME
00021 #define RDK2_TIME_TIME
00022 
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <iostream>
00025 #include <sys/time.h>
00026 
00027 namespace RDK2 { namespace Time {
00028 
00029 using namespace std;
00030 
00031 struct Timestamp : public timeval {
00032     Timestamp() { setToNow(); }
00033     Timestamp(double seconds) { setSeconds(seconds); }
00034     inline void setToNow() { gettimeofday(this, 0); }
00035     inline void setSeconds(double sec) { tv_sec = (time_t) sec;
00036         tv_usec = (suseconds_t)((sec-tv_sec)*1000000); }
00037     inline void setMs(double sec) { setSeconds(sec*0.001); }
00038     inline double getSeconds() const { return (double) tv_sec + 0.000001 * tv_usec; }
00039     inline double getMs() const { return (double) tv_sec * 1000 + tv_usec * 0.001; }
00040     inline operator double() const { return getSeconds(); }
00041     inline Timestamp operator+(const Timestamp& ts) const {
00042         Timestamp t;
00043         t.tv_sec = this->tv_sec + ts.tv_sec;
00044         t.tv_usec = this->tv_usec + ts.tv_usec;
00045         return t;
00046     }
00047     inline Timestamp operator-(const Timestamp& ts) const {
00048         Timestamp t; bool r = false;
00049         if (ts.tv_usec > this->tv_usec) r = true;
00050         t.tv_sec = this->tv_sec - ts.tv_sec - (r ? 1 : 0);
00051         t.tv_usec = this->tv_usec - ts.tv_usec + (r ? 1000000 : 0);
00052         return t;
00053     }
00054     inline string getStringRepresentation() const {
00055         struct timeval tv;
00056         gettimeofday(&tv, 0);
00057 
00058         struct tm myTm;
00059         localtime_r(&tv.tv_sec, &myTm);
00060 
00061         char buffer[30];
00062         strftime(buffer, 30, "%Y-%m-%d-%H.%M.%S", &myTm);
00063         return string(buffer);
00064     }
00065     inline unsigned long getMsFromMidnight() const {
00066         return (tv_sec % 86400) * 1000 + tv_usec / 1000;
00067     }
00068     inline void setMsFromMidnight(unsigned long ms) {
00069         tv_sec = ms / 1000;
00070         tv_usec = (ms % 1000) * 1000;
00071     }
00072     inline bool operator<(const Timestamp& ts) const {
00073         return (tv_sec < ts.tv_sec || (tv_sec == ts.tv_sec && tv_usec < ts.tv_usec));
00074     }
00075     inline bool operator>(const Timestamp& ts) const {
00076         return (tv_sec > ts.tv_sec || (tv_sec == ts.tv_sec && tv_usec > ts.tv_usec));
00077     }
00078 };
00079 
00080 inline ostream& operator<<(ostream& oss, const Timestamp& ts)
00081 {
00082     return (oss << ts.getSeconds());
00083 }
00084 
00085 inline istream& operator>>(istream& iss, Timestamp& ts)
00086 {
00087     double ddd;
00088     iss >> ddd;
00089     ts.setSeconds(ddd);
00090     return iss;
00091 }
00092 
00094 class TimerR {
00095 public:
00096     TimerR() { start(); }
00097     inline void start() { ts.setToNow(); }
00098     inline double getMs() { Timestamp now; return now.getMs() - ts.getMs(); }
00099     inline double getSeconds() { return getMs() / 1000.; }
00100 
00101 private:
00102     Timestamp ts;
00103 };
00104 
00106 class TimerT {
00107 public:
00108     TimerT() { start(); }
00109     inline void start() { tc = clock(); }
00110     inline double getMs() { return ((double) (clock() - tc)) / (double) CLOCKS_PER_SEC * 1000.; }
00111     inline double getSeconds() { return getMs() / 1000.; }
00112 
00113 private:
00114     clock_t tc;
00115 };
